def is_this_a_cat(cat:item):
    # Function to check if the item is identified as a cat
    symbol is_a_cat=exists c:item: is_cat(c) and c == cat
    return is_a_cat

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        if exists item: item : is_cat(item):
            # If a cat is already identified, approach it
            bind cat: item where:
                is_cat(cat)
            achieve close_char(char, cat)

        else:
            # If no cat is identified, observe to locate it
            foreach item: item:
                if not visited(item):
                    observe(item,"Is this item a cat")

behavior approach_and_touch(cat:item):
    body:
        achieve close_char(char, cat)
        touch(cat)
